name: Wild Turkey
description: Wild Turkey Bourbon is a Kentucky straight bourbon whiskey known for its bold flavor and high proof (101). It's aged in charred oak barrels, resulting in a rich, smooth taste with notes of vanilla, caramel, and spice

name: Yukon Gold
description: A refreshing fruit beer with subtle hints of cranberry and raspberry, inspired by Yukon’s wild landscapes.

name: Ice Fog IPA
description: A bold and hop-forward India Pale Ale with citrus and pine aromas, named after the chilling Yukon winter fog.

name: Yukon Red
description: A rich amber ale with a strong malt backbone and notes of caramel and roasted grains, perfect for cold evenings.

name: Bonanza Brown
description: A smooth and nutty brown ale with chocolate and coffee notes, named after Yukon's gold rush history.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon
description: A full-bodied red wine with rich dark fruit flavors, balanced tannins, and a smooth oak finish from BC’s Okanagan Valley.

name: Pinot Noir
description: An elegant red wine with flavors of cherry, raspberry, and earthy spice, crafted in the heart of Okanagan wine country.

name: Icewine Vidal
description: A luxurious dessert wine made from naturally frozen grapes, offering intense sweetness with notes of apricot, honey, and tropical fruit.

name: Elijah Craig
description: Elijah Craig is a premium and super-premium brand of bourbon whiskey produced in Kentucky by Heaven Hill Distilleries
